nodes.text: Jurgen Nath's Hideout was a bunker on Naboo's moon of Rori during the Galactic Civil War. The hideout was controlled by Jurgen Nath and his group of bandits. Circa 1 ABY, the Narmle Militia was able to confirm the presence of Vladlun Travan in the bunker and gave this information to Wernell Covington whose daughter Felicia had been murdered by Travan years ago. Covington sent a spacer to the hideout and the latter killed Vladlun Travan to avenge the murder of Covington's daughter.

Jurgen Nath's Hideout was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011. Jurgen Nath's Hideout was added to the game with the release of the "Game Update 12", on August 10, 2009.
